description: This file defines a Fragment class for user authentication in an Android app. It manages UI elements for login and registration actions, observes authentication state, and navigates to a notes list upon successful login.

classes.name: AuthFragment
classes.description: A Fragment providing a user interface for authentication, allowing login and registration, and navigating to the notes list upon success.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the authentication fragment.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up observers for authentication state, and handles button click events for login and registration.
